import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Animation from './Animation' import { SectionsContainer, Section } from 'react-fullpage' import TagsInput from './TagsInput' import Madcomponent from './Mapcomponent' import serialize from 'serialize-javascript' const Login = () => { let options = { anchors: ['sectionOne', 'sectionTwo', 'sectionThree'], } const navigate = useNavigate() const [nickname, setNickName] = useState('') const [map, setMap] = useState([]) const [tag, setTag] = useState([]) const Rest_api_key = 'dcb8c3b23d720c296085cbdc9046ece9' const redirect_uri = 'http://localhost:3000/oauth' const API_URL = 'http://172.10.5.102:80' const kakaoURL = `http://kauth.kakao.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=${Rest_api_key}&redirect_uri=${redirect_uri}&response_type=code` function serialize(obj) { const simpleObject = { nickname: obj.nickname, map: obj.map, tag: obj.tag, } return JSON.stringify(simpleObject) } const postInfo = async () => { try { console.log('nickname:', nickname) console.log('map:', map) console.log('tag:', tag) await axios({ method: 'post', url: `${API_URL}/signup`, data: serialize({ nickname, map, tag, }), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', Authorization: localStorage.getItem('user_token'), }, }) console.log('서버로 데이터 보내기 성공') } catch (e) { console.log('무슨오류냐면', e) } } return (

 ) } export default Login
